Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.epitech.pictsmanager.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/users") public class UserController extends Object
Controller class for managing user-related operations

      Retrieves a user by ID
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP servlet request containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      The user entity if found, otherwise returns a no content response

    • updateUser

      Updates a user's information
      Parameters:
      user - The updated user entity
      request - The HTTP servlet request containing the JWT token
      Returns:

    • saveUser

      @PostMapping("adduser") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> saveUser(@RequestBody User user)
      Saves a new user
      Parameters:
      user - The user entity to save
      Returns:
      A response entity indicating whether the user has been added successfully or not
